attribute.name: mpiCommand
attribute.description: Optional MPI command to run job.

attribute.name: LSF_JOB_RESIZABLE
attribute.tooltip: The job is autoresizable. (-ar)

attribute.name: LSF_NOTIFY_DISPATCH
attribute.tooltip: Send you email when your job is dispatched. (-B)

attribute.name: LSF_NOTIFY_COMPLETION
attribute.tooltip: Send you email when your job completes. This option is disabled if STDOUT pathnames are blank (-N)

attribute.name: LSF_RERUN_SYS_FAILURE
attribute.tooltip: Rerun job if host or system fails. (-r)

attribute.name: LSF_NORERUN_SYS_FAILURE
attribute.tooltip: Job is never rerunnable. (-rn)

attribute.name: LSF_PASS_USER_LIMITS
attribute.tooltip: Pass user shell limits to execution host. User limits cannot override OS or queue limits. (-ul)

attribute.name: LSF_EXCLUSIVE_EXECUTION
attribute.tooltip: Puts the host running your job into exclusive execution mode. (-x)

attribute.name: LSF_APP_PROFILE
attribute.tooltip: Submit the job to the specified, existing application profile. (-app)

attribute.name: LSF_DISPATCH_AT
attribute.tooltip: Dispatch the job at or after the specified date and time. (-b)

validator.error-message: Dispatch At Time format is incorrect.

attribute.name: LSF_COREFILE_LIMIT
attribute.tooltip: Set a soft per-process core file size limit for all processes in this batch job. (-C)

validator.error-message: Core file limit must be a numeric value.

attribute.name: LSF_CPUTIME_LIMIT
attribute.tooltip: Limits the total CPU time for the job to prevent runaway jobs. (-c)

attribute.name: LSF_DATA_LIMIT
attribute.tooltip: Set a per process soft data segment size limit for each process in the job. (-D)

validator.error-message: Data segment limit must be a numeric value.

attribute.name: LSF_STDERR_PATH_APPEND
attribute.tooltip: Standard error (STDERR) application output is appended to the file specified by this option. (-e)

attribute.name: LSF_STDERR_PATH_NEW
attribute.tooltip: Standard error (STDERR) application output is written to the file specified by this option. (-eo)

attribute.name: LSF_FILESIZE_LIMIT
attribute.tooltip: Set a per process soft file size limit for each process in the job. (-F)

validator.error-message: File size limit must be a numeric value.

attribute.name: LSF_USER_GROUP
attribute.tooltip: Associates the job with the specified user group. (-G)

attribute.name: LSF_JOB_GROUP
attribute.tooltip: Submits jobs in the specified job group. (-g)

attribute.name: LSF_STDIN_PATH
attribute.tooltip: Use the specified file for standard input (STDIN). (-i)

attribute.name: LSF_STDIN_EDITABLE_PATH
attribute.tooltip: Use the specified file for standard input (STDIN). The original file may be edited or deleted after job submission. (-is)

attribute.name: LSF_JOB_NAME
attribute.tooltip: Sets the job name for this job. (-J)

attribute.name: LSF_JOB_DESCRIPTION
attribute.tooltip: Sets the job description for this job. (-Jd)

attribute.name: LSF_JSDL_FILE
attribute.tooltip: Submit a job using a JSDL file with LSF extensions schema. (-jsdl)

attribute.name: LSF_JSDL_FILE_STRICT
attribute.tooltip: Submit a job using a JSDL file with standard schema. (-jsdl_strict)

attribute.name: LSF_CHECKPOINT
attribute.tooltip: Make a job checkpointable and specify the checkpoint directory. (-k)

attribute.name: LSF_LOGIN_SHELL
attribute.tooltip: Initialize the execution environment using the specified login shell. (-L)

attribute.name: LSF_LICENSE_SCHEDULER_PROJECT
attribute.tooltip: Assigns the job to the specified License Sceduler project. (-Lp)

attribute.name: LSF_MEMORY_LIMIT
attribute.tooltip: Set a per process soft memory limit for all processes in this job. (-M)

validator.error-message: Memory limit must be a numeric value.

attribute.name: LSF_HOST_NAMES
attribute.tooltip: Run the job on one of the specified hosts, host groups or compute units. (-m)

attribute.name: LSF_MIGRATION
attribute.tooltip: Specify migration threhshold for checkpointable and rerunnable jobs. (-mig)

attribute.name: LSF_NUM_PROCS
attribute.tooltip: Specify minimum and optional maximum number of processors to run the job. (-n)

validator.error-message: Number of processors must be numeric or numeric pair.

attribute.name: LSF_NETWORK
attribute.tooltip: Specify network attributes (type, protocol, mode, usage, instance, etc). (-network)

attribute.name: LSF_STDOUT_PATH_APPEND
attribute.tooltip: Appends standard output (STDOUT) output to the specified file. (-o)

attribute.name: LSF_STDOUT_PATH_NEW
attribute.tooltip: Writes standard output (STDOUT) output to the specified file. (-oo)

attribute.name: LSF_PROJECT_NAME
attribute.tooltip: Assigns the job to the specified project. (-P)

attribute.name: LSF_PROCESS_LIMIT
attribute.tooltip: Sets the limit of the numer of processes for the entire job. (-p)

validator.error-message: Process limit must be a numeric value.

attribute.name: LSF_REQUEUE_CODES
attribute.tooltip: Specify automatic job requeue exit values. (-Q)

attribute.name: LSF_QUEUE
attribute.tooltip: Submits the job to the specified queue. (-q)

attribute.name: LSF_RESOURCES
attribute.tooltip: Runs the job on a host that meets the specified requirements. (-R)

attribute.name: LSF_STACK_LIMIT
attribute.tooltip: Sets a per process soft limit for the thye stack for each process in the job. (-S)

validator.error-message: Stack limit must be a numeric value.

attribute.name: LSF_SIGNAL
attribute.tooltip: Send the specified signal qhen a queue-level run window closes. (-s)

attribute.name: LSF_SERVICE_CLASS
attribute.tooltip: Specifies the service class where the job is to run. (-sla)

attribute.name: LSF_JOB_PRIORITY
attribute.tooltip: Set user-specified job priority for this job. (-sp)

attribute.name: LSF_THREAD_LIMIT
attribute.tooltip: Sets the limit for the number of concurrent threads for the entire job. (-T)

validator.error-message: Thread limit must be a numeric value.

attribute.name: LSF_TERMINATION_DEADLINE
attribute.tooltip: Specifies the job termination deadline. (-t)

attribute.name: LSF_RESERVATION_ID
attribute.tooltip: Use the specified reservation id when scheduling the job. (-U)

attribute.name: LSF_EMAIL_ID
attribute.tooltip: Send notification emails to the specified email address. (-u)

attribute.name: LSF_SWAP_LIMIT
attribute.tooltip: Set the total process virtual memory limit for the job. (-v)

validator.error-message: Swap limit must be a numeric value.

attribute.name: LSF_RUNTIME_LIMIT
attribute.tooltip: Set the runtime limit for job. (-W)

attribute.name: LSF_DEPENDENCIES
attribute.tooltip: Specify dependencies for job. (-w)

attribute.name: LSF_JOB_ACTION
attribute.tooltip: Specify job action to be taken before a job action occurs. (-Wa)

attribute.name: LSF_RUNTIME_ESTIMATE
attribute.tooltip: Specify estimated runtime for job. (-We)

attribute.name: LSF_JOB_ACTION_TIME
attribute.tooltip: Specify time before a job control action that a job action occurs. (-Wt)

attribute.name: LSF_OTHER_OPTIONS
attribute.tooltip: Specify LSF options that don't appear elsewhere in list.

attribute.name: LSF_MPI_COMMAND
attribute.tooltip: Optional MPI command to run job.
